main event: A sighting of a bright, white, disc-shaped flying object occurred on July 29, 1956, approximately 400 miles west of Monterey, California.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2 minutes from 1305 to 1307., The object changed speed and color during the observation., The sighting was classified as a ground-visual evaluation., The report is from Project Blue Book., There were comments indicating witness involvement.
sighted object: a bright, white, disc-shaped flying object
location: 400 Mi W of Monterey, California, USA
